title: Leaverbuster
body: Why is my client crashing everytime I play? I am being put in leaverbuster for each game I dc. That is unfair, my client dcs and i have to another 5 hours of life. Reconsider changing leaverbuster affects, each season they should reset the timers to the first one. Right now im believing that riot is just taking my fun away to waste my time on leaverbusters, i would rather play moba on my phone than leauge of legends

replies.body:
We definitely don't want you to keep getting hit with leaverbusters when your client is crashing! Let's see if we can get to the bottom of why you keep getting these crashes, but until we do your best bet is to test any changes in custom games to avoid more leaverbusters. 

Let's see if we can narrow down this situation to find out exactly what's causing these crashes. Go through our [**Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) which covers most of the typical causes of crashes. Let me know how this helps!
